document.full_text: the coachella music festival, the biggest annual gathering of its type in the united states, will expand to two weekends next year, its promoters said on tuesday.
document.title: coachella music festival doubling in 2012
lines_and_colors: the coachella music festival, the biggest annual gathering of its type in the united states, will expand to two weekends next year, its promoters said on tuesday.
